column2: # Preparing the data (svm_rec): This involves making sure all the numerical features are scaled correctly and applying some transformations to make the data nicer for the assistant to work with.

# Setting up the SVM model (svm_spec): This is where you tell the assistant that it can adjust its glasses (the tuning parameters) to see better. You also tell it to use a specific way of looking at the data (the RBF kernel).
# Combining everything (svm_wflow): Finally, you put together the prepared data and the SVM model, ready to start the classification process.
